verses.verse: Yet now <S%H8085>hear<s%>, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom I have <S%H977>chosen<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3335>you<s%>, and formed you from the <S%H990>womb<s%>, which will <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3372>you<s%>; Fear <S%H3290>not<s%>, O Jacob, my <S%H5650>servant<s%>; and <S%H3484>you<s%>, Jesurun, whom I have <S%H977>chosen<s%>.

For I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> upon him that is <S%H6771>thirsty<s%>, and <S%H5140>floods<s%> upon the dry <S%H3004>ground<s%>: I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> upon your <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon your <S%H6631>offspring<s%>:
And they shall spring <S%H6779>up<s%> as <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H2682>grass<s%>, as <S%H6155>willows<s%> by the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H2988>courses<s%>.

One shall <S%H559>say<s%>, I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s; and another shall <S%H7121>call<s%> himself by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; and another shall <S%H3789>subscribe<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H3655>surname<s%> himself by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and his <S%H1350>redeemer<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; I am the <S%H7223>first<s%>, and I am the <S%H314>last<s%>; and <S%H1107>beside<s%> me there is no <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H7121>who<s%>, as I, shall call, and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H6186>it<s%>, and set it in order for <S%H7760>me<s%>, since I appointed the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>? and the things that are <S%H857>coming<s%>, and shall <S%H935>come<s%>, let them show unto <S%H5046>them<s%>.

<S%H6342>Fear<s%> you <S%H7297>not<s%>, neither be afraid: have not I <S%H8085>told<s%> you from that <S%H227>time<s%>, and have <S%H5046>declared<s%> <S%H5707>it<s%>? you are even my witnesses. Is <S%H3426>there<s%> a <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H1107>beside<s%> <S%H6697>me<s%>? Yes, there is no God; I know not <S%H3045>any<s%>.

They that <S%H3335>make<s%> a engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> are all of them <S%H8414>vanity<s%>; and their delectable <S%H2530>things<s%> shall not <S%H3276>profit<s%>; and they are their own <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>; they <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3045>not<s%>, nor know; that they may be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>.
Who has <S%H3335>formed<s%> a <S%H410>god<s%>, or <S%H5258>molded<s%> a engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> that is <S%H3276>profitable<s%> for <S%H1115>nothing<s%>?

<S%H2270>Behold<s%>, all his fellows shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>: and the <S%H2796>workmen<s%>, they are of <S%H120>men<s%>: let them all be gathered <S%H6908>together<s%>, let them stand <S%H5975>up<s%>; yet they shall <S%H6342>fear<s%>, and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

The <S%H1270>blacksmith<s%> with the <S%H4621>tongs<s%> both <S%H6466>works<s%> in the <S%H6352>coals<s%>, and <S%H3335>fashions<s%> it with <S%H4717>hammers<s%>, and <S%H6466>works<s%> it with the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of his <S%H2220>arms<s%>: <S%H7457>Yes<s%>, he is hungry, and his <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H369>fails<s%>: he <S%H8354>drinks<s%> no <S%H4325>water<s%>, and is <S%H3286>faint<s%>.

The <S%H2796>carpenter<s%> stretches <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H6957>rule<s%>; he marks it <S%H8388>out<s%> with a <S%H8279>line<s%>; he <S%H6213>fits<s%> it with <S%H4741>planes<s%>, and he marks it <S%H8388>out<s%> with the <S%H4230>compass<s%>, and <S%H6213>makes<s%> it after the <S%H8403>figure<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>, according to the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>; that it may <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

He cuts him <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%>, and <S%H3947>takes<s%> the <S%H8645>cypress<s%> and the <S%H437>oak<s%>, which he <S%H553>strengthens<s%> for himself among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>: he <S%H5193>plants<s%> a <S%H766>ash<s%>, and the <S%H1653>rain<s%> does nourish <S%H1431>it<s%>.

Then shall it be for a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H1197>burn<s%>: for he will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2552>there<s%>, and warm <S%H5400>himself<s%>; Yes, he kindles <S%H644>it<s%>, and bakes <S%H3899>bread<s%>; <S%H6466>Yes<s%>, he makes a <S%H410>god<s%>, and <S%H7812>worships<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>; he makes it a engraved <S%H6459>image<s%>, and falls down to <S%H5456>it<s%>.

He <S%H8313>burns<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> there <S%H1119>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>; with <S%H2677>part<s%> there he <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; he <S%H6740>roasts<s%> <S%H6748>roast<s%>, and is <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>: <S%H2552>Yes<s%>, he warms <S%H559>himself<s%>, and says, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, I am <S%H2552>warm<s%>, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H217>fire<s%>:

And with the <S%H7611>residue<s%> he <S%H6213>makes<s%> a <S%H410>god<s%>, even his engraved <S%H6459>image<s%>: he falls <S%H5456>down<s%> unto <S%H7812>it<s%>, and worships <S%H6419>it<s%>, and prays unto <S%H559>it<s%>, and says, <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> <S%H410>me<s%>; for you are my god.

They have not <S%H3045>known<s%> nor <S%H995>understood<s%>: for he has <S%H2902>shut<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, that they cannot <S%H7200>see<s%>; and their <S%H3826>hearts<s%>, that they cannot <S%H7919>understand<s%>.

And none <S%H7725>considers<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, neither is there <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> nor <S%H8394>understanding<s%> to <S%H559>say<s%>, I have <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> of it <S%H1119>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>; <S%H644>Yes<s%>, also I have baked <S%H3899>bread<s%> upon the <S%H1513>coals<s%> <S%H6740>there<s%>; I have roasted <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>: and shall I make the <S%H3499>residue<s%> there an <S%H8441>abomination<s%>? shall I fall <S%H5456>down<s%> to the <S%H944>stock<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree<s%>?

He <S%H7462>feeds<s%> on <S%H665>ashes<s%>: a <S%H2048>deceived<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> has turned him <S%H5186>aside<s%>, that he cannot <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%>, nor <S%H559>say<s%>, Is there not a <S%H8267>lie<s%> in my right <S%H3225>hand<s%>?

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H3290>these<s%>, O Jacob and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for you are my <S%H5650>servant<s%>: I have <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H5650>you<s%>; you are my servant: O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, you shall not be forgotten of <S%H5382>me<s%>.

I have blotted <S%H4229>out<s%>, as a thick <S%H5645>cloud<s%>, your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>, <S%H6051>and<s%>, as a cloud, your <S%H2403>sins<s%>: <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H1350>me<s%>; for I have redeemed you.

<S%H7442>Sing<s%>, O you <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7321>it<s%>: shout, you lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing<s%>, you <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, O <S%H3293>forest<s%>, and every <S%H6086>tree<s%> in <S%H3068>it<s%>: for the Lord has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H6286>glorified<s%> himself in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, your <S%H1350>redeemer<s%>, and he that <S%H3335>formed<s%> you from the <S%H990>womb<s%>, I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H6213>makes<s%> all <S%H5186>things<s%>; that stretches forth the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H7554>alone<s%>; that spreads abroad the earth by <S%H776>myself<s%>;

That <S%H6565>frustrates<s%> the <S%H226>tokens<s%> of the <S%H907>liars<s%>, and makes <S%H7080>diviners<s%> <S%H1984>mad<s%>; that <S%H7725>turns<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> men <S%H268>backward<s%>, and makes their <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H5528>foolish<s%>;

That <S%H6965>confirms<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and <S%H7999>performs<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of his <S%H4397>messengers<s%>; that <S%H559>says<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, You shall be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>; and to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, You shall be <S%H1129>built<s%>, and I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the decayed places <S%H2723>there<s%>:
That <S%H559>says<s%> to the <S%H6683>deep<s%>, Be <S%H2717>dry<s%>, and I will dry <S%H3001>up<s%> your <S%H5104>rivers<s%>:

That <S%H559>says<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%>, He is my <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>, and shall <S%H7999>perform<s%> all my <S%H2656>pleasure<s%>: even <S%H559>saying<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, You shall be <S%H1129>built<s%>; and to the <S%H1964>temple<s%>, Your foundation shall be <S%H3245>laid<s%>.
